short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read weights from weighing scale bridges to your webapp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to read weights form weighing balances provided the Bridge Daemon is running in background which acts as provider for the service.
